web_programming.title: Office Internal Memo System

description.en: Website to order memos around the office according to the department of the requester, the memo requires to be approved by user with level 1 and level 2 clearance timestamp is generated when both is cleared. Items of the memo is managed by the administrator.

web_programming.tools: PHP CI HTML CSS JS JQuery MySql

web_programming.title: Modular Website for IoT System

description.en: Created to receive and process data, sending commands to the IoT Device, the device will check regularly for new command once finished it will send an affirmation to the webserver to be tagged as finished. Supports graphs and other display system for sensor data.

web_programming.tools: PHP CI HTML CSS Bootstrap MySql ESP8266

web_programming.tools: PHP CI HTML CSS Bootstrap JS JQuery MySql

description.en: Managing distribution of ID card, the owner of the card can modify their data for correction.
Simple grid heatmap using js Grid is created using cartesian coordinate, size can be adjusted manually, images and coordinates are located in database.
Ultra lightweight css framework utilizing table layout, created to reduce garbage loaded by 'modern' web standard.
